CHANGELOG
----------------------------------------
version 0.0.2 playtest
Adds acid, water, and walls. This version
is where development truly began, and it
is the version that I open-sourced the
project.

version 0.0.1 (sand only) playtest
Originally only released on me and my
friend's private Discord server, this
has only sand. It is very bare-bones, and
doesn't add much at all.
